name: 𝘿𝙧𝙖𝙂𝙤𝙣 𝙈𝙪𝙨𝙞𝙘 𝘽𝙤𝙩
description: بوت ميوزك لتشغيل موسيقى في المكالمه الجماعية ، أيضا يدعم تشغيل الفيديو ، ويدعم التحميل الملسلات والأغاني الى حجم يصل  الى 2 جيجا

آب ايدي.description: You better get this value from https://my.telegram.org, if you can't just use it as it.

ايبي هاش.description: You better get this value from https://my.telegram.org, if you can't just use it as it.

عيفها.description: If you want your assistant to leave all chats automatically after some time. If you set it to True your Assistant account might get banned by Telegram

قاعدة البيانات.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com . You can leave it blank if you want , bot will use Yukki's database for you.

اسم البوت لا تخلي مزخرف.description: A name for your Music Bot. Please don't use ascii characters

ايدي المالك.description: The user id(s) of user(s) whom you would like to add as a OWNER. Multiple values shall be seperated with a space.

جلسة بايروجرام.description: A Pyrogram String Session. One Assistant is Compulsory.

ايدي الكروب.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Use only Group. Please don't use Channel ID.

عيفها.description: If you dont know this, Leave as it is ( If you don't wanna get you Heroku account banned don't change this )
